ygData.subject: RE: Great post on item balancing (Long)
ygData.msgSnippet: They actually have their own mag now as well.  Way too hysterical for reading at work.  Its got to be one of the funniest things I have ever read on gamers and
ygData.messageBody:
They actually have their own mag now as well. Way too hysterical for
reading at work. Its got to be one of the funniest things I have ever read
on gamers and the gaming industry.

Kitasi

-----Original Message-----
From: Katy Westerman [mailto:katyw@...]
Sent: Wednesday, December 01, 1999 4:08 PM
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Great post on item balancing (Long)


From: Katy Westerman <katyw@...>


> Nope, you nailed it. Gawds, I love those guys. Have me in fits every
time
> I get a new issue. Truth is I know people who fit almost all of them.
> Still haven't run into a Nitro though. Not sure if thats a good thing or
> not.
>
> Kitasi

That's from that Rifts magazine right? I vaguely remember that, but
haven't seen one in awhile...And yes, we had one of *everyone* in our
Rifts group.

Robynn
